event.description: Jean Segura singles on a ground ball to right fielder George Springer.
Mitch Haniger grounds into a force out, shortstop Carlos Correa to second baseman Jose Altuve. Jean Segura out at 2nd. Mitch Haniger to 1st.
With Robinson Cano batting, Mitch Haniger steals (1) 2nd base.
Robinson Cano strikes out swinging.
Nelson Cruz grounds out, second baseman Jose Altuve to first baseman Yuli Gurriel.
Kyle Seager grounds out to first baseman Yuli Gurriel.
Danny Valencia called out on strikes.
Mike Zunino doubles (1) on a sharp line drive to center fielder Jake Marisnick.
